ical threats against another person.=C2=A0

ng ????? That Box works,I dont know how but it works,and I believe if your =
not careful you can get EVIL to come out...Get off Franks back...Or I'll fi=
nd you and you dont want that...get with it or GET LOST...Thats my opion,le=
t me know Frank and I'll take a road trip.I got laid off today and I'm in t=
he mood to screw something or someone up !!!!!
